name: Nostalgici Anonimi
storyline:
In a dystopian future where emotions and nostalgia are considered a disease the government has created the program Nostalgic Anonymous, run by android therapists.

You will arrive in this future and meet the android helping three teenagers suffering from the nostalgia disease. They love past narrations and Angel wants to stop this and turn them in good citizens. They, however, don't want to change and just want to escape.

And this where your journey starts.

Will you help Angel or the teenagers?
Will you be able to come back to the present?
summary:
Can't stop playing video games? You watch over and over again your favorite TV shows? Don't worry! The Nostalgici Anonimi visual novel program is here for you! Our expert team of androids uses dialogue, listening and card interpretations to help you overcome your obsessions.
Join the program now!
